name: Jam In Traffic
description:
It's a Jam?!   No, It's a Traffic?!  It's a... Umm... Jam In Traffic?

A game where you need to escape Mr. Spoon and Mrs. bread. 

Don't let them spread you!!!

Your goal is to avoid traffic jams on the way and reach the Finish Line!

You control The car and Traffic lights, so use that power wisely.

Game was made for:
Kindred Games Community Jam #9 

with a Theme: "Jam" Creators: 

Yvaryvare: https://yvaryvare.itch.io

Nika: https://nika21.itch.io

Pre-Made assets:

Buildings: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/low-poly-epic-city-202624
